androidx.test.espresso.matcher

Class CursorMatchers.CursorMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • androidx.test.espresso.matcher.BoundedMatcher<java.lang.Object,Cursor>

  • Enclosing class:
    CursorMatchers

    public static class CursorMatchers.CursorMatcher
extends BoundedMatcher<java.lang.Object,Cursor>
    A Matcher that matches Cursors based on values in their columns.

      • describeTo

        public void describeTo(Description description)

      • withStrictColumnChecks

        public CursorMatchers.CursorMatcher withStrictColumnChecks(boolean checkColumns)
        Allows test authors to override whether the the matcher should throw an IllegalArgumentException if the column name/count is not valid. This is useful in the case where a cursor may iterates over a data set with variable columns. By default, the checks are on.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
